member.summary: Gets a delegate to handle converting a nancy response to the format required by OWIN and signals that the we are now complete.
member.param: The next stage in the OWIN pipeline.
The task completion source to signal.
A predicate that will allow the caller to determine if the request passes through to the next stage in the owin pipeline.
